metadata.job_to_be_done: Analyze revenue trends, R&D investments, and market positioning strategies from the latest annual reports.

extracted_sections.section_title: Email-specific options on the Settings tab

sub_section_analysis.refined_text: An overview of the document is generated with section headings and summaries. Whether you're a researcher, business analyst, or student, the generative AI features help you scan your PDF documents and quickly extract the essence, key points, and insights. Selecting a summary takes you directly to the corresponding section in the document for more detailed information.

Choose Select files and select one or multiple files to start a conversation with your documents and extract insights. You can also open any meeting transcript directly in the viewer and use Acrobat's generative AI features for insights or summaries. Acrobat online Alternatively, in Acrobat Home, select All tools , then select AI Assistant or Generative summary tool.

View meeting details in Acrobat You can access the list of meeting transcripts from Acrobat Home in Microsoft Teams. The list of meetings is now available in Acrobat. You can also filter meetings based on a date range.

Then, download the meeting transcript and open it in Acrobat to use the AI features. Choose Select file to select and open the transcript in Acrobat. In Acrobat Home, select Add meeting transcripts under Third-party apps .

• Parallel processing : While you engage with the summarized sections, the feature extracts headings, and generates summaries for the subsequent sections. The key advantages of streaming summaries include: • Real-time streaming : As Acrobat or Acrobat Reader processes a lengthy PDF, it concurrently streams summaries for sections it has already analyzed. • Segmented display : When you start generating the summary for your content, you'll immediately see summarized content for the sections that the Generative summary feature finished processing.

Do one of the following: • (Outlook) Choose Acrobat > Setup Automatic Archival . Then select options for Frequency and the time of day at which automatic archiving occurs. • (Lotus Notes) Choose Actions > Setup Automatic Archival .

The following options appear when you open the PDFMaker settings from within Microsoft Outlook or Lotus Notes. Show This Number Of Recent Archives (Outlook only) When converting email messages and folders, the Adobe PDF > [ Convert Selected Messages and Convert Selected Folders ] menus can list recently created PDFs to append. If you’re creating PDFs that are distributed widely, choose an earlier level to ensure that all users can view and print the document.

For a comparison chart, see Compatible web browsers and PDFMaker applications | Acrobat, Reader . PDFMaker is an Acrobat feature that operates within many business applications, such as Microsoft Office applications, AutoCAD, and Lotus Notes. Note: Some PDFMaker features are not available in certain versions of the authoring applications.

It can analyze multiple documents to uncover similarities, differences, and key patterns. It can extract information accurately from tables and complex documents. With AI Assistant, you can make targeted requests, such as highlighting the differences between PDF contracts.

You can scan your paper documents and upload them to Acrobat to get concise summaries and accurate answers to your questions. It also breaks down complex language into key details, making it easy to read and understand contracts directly in Acrobat. AI Assistant supports scanned documents.
